Uses of Interface
massim.framework.AgentProvider

  • Packages that use AgentProvider 
    Package Description
    massim.framework  

    • Uses of AgentProvider in massim.framework

      Classes in massim.framework that implement AgentProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractAgentFilter
      This class provides a good start to build agent provider that are based on another agent provider which will just filter it's offers by some criteria based upon an agent parameter.
      class  ArrayAgentProvider
      This class is able to serve as an AgentProvider.
      class  TeamAgentFilter
      This class allows filtering agents that do not belong to a certain team, based upon a map which agent belongs to which team.
      Methods in massim.framework that return AgentProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AgentProvider AgentProviderAgentManager.getAgentProvider() 
      AgentProvider AbstractAgentFilter.getBase() 
      Methods in massim.framework with parameters of type AgentProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AgentProviderAgentManager.setAgentProvider(AgentProvider p) 
      Constructors in massim.framework with parameters of type AgentProvider 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractAgentFilter(AgentProvider b) 
      AgentProviderAgentManager(AgentProvider agentProvider)
      Creates a new AgentProviderAgentManager based upon an AgentProvider.
      TeamAgentFilter(Map<Account,Object> teammap, AgentProvider agentprovider)
      Construct a new TeamAgentFilter.
